Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Select whether or not to use a set of modified stage files. These will allow Sonic to handle more consistently during certain missions / bosses in the standard game.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Select whether Modern Sonic will have the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button or the Jump button.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Select whether or not Classic Sonic will use a set of physics based more directly on Sonic Unleashed.
Load stage files recommended for use during the standard game's missions / bosses.
Load no extra stage files. Recommended for use with most stage mods.
Map the Homing Attack to the Boost button.
Map the Homing Attack to the Jump button.
Classic Sonic will handle more like Unleashed Sonic.
Classic Sonic will use his original physics from Sonic Generations, or from another mod if applicable.
